job.title: Data Scientist, Growth Analytics
job.description: ltstronggtAtlassian can hire people in any country where we have a legal entity assuming candidates have eligible working rights and a sufficient timezone overlap with their team As our offices reopen Atlassians can choose to work remotely or return to an office unless its necessary for the role to be performed in the office Interviews and onboarding are conducted virtually a part of being a distributedfirst company ltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltstronggtltugtJob DutiesltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtLIAISE WITH ATLASSIANS UNIQUE TEAM OF ANALYSTS DATA SCIENTISTS DEVELOPERS DESIGNERS AND PRODUCT MANAGERS TO RUN EXPERIMENTS AGAINST ATLASSIAN USERS UTILIZE DATA ANALYTICS TO SUPPORT SOFTWARE DEVELOPMENT FOR ATLASSIANS SOFTWARE PRODUCTS RESPONSIBLE FOR DESIGNING AND ANALYZING EXPERIMENTS THAT DRIVE KEY PRODUCT DECISIONS UTILIZING KNOWLEDGE OF SQL PYTHON AND AB TESTING UTILIZE SQL EXPERTISE CUSTOMER FOCUSED DATA ANALYTICS AND BEHAVIORAL PRODUCT ANALYTICS TO SUPPORT INSIGHT GENERATION REPORTING AND ROADMAP DECISIONS TO SUPPORT PRODUCTS DECISIONS RESPONSIBLE FOR MODELLING CUSTOMER BEHAVIOR USING DISPARATE DATASETS WORK WITH ANALYTICS AND VISUALIZATION TOOLS SUCH AS TABLEAU MODE ETC WORK WITH ENTERPRISE OR B2B AS WELL AS CONSUMER OR B2C ENVIRONMENTS ASSIST IN DEFINING AND DEVELOPING DEEP INSIGHTS FOR ATLASSIANS PRODUCTS UTILIZING STATISTICAL TECHNIQUES SUCH AS LINEAR REGRESSION LOGISTIC REGRESSION CLUSTERING AND CAUSAL INFERENCE PROVIDE QUANTITATIVE AND QUALITATIVE INSIGHTS FOR ATLASSIANS GROWTH TEAM TO SUPPORT OPPORTUNITIES THAT DRIVE REVENUEltbrgtltbrgtMINIMUM REQUIREMENTS MASTERS DEGREE IN STATISTICS BIOSTATISTICS COMPUTER SCIENCE MATHEMATICS OR A CLOSELY RELATED ANALYTICAL FIELD OF STUDY PLUS TWO 2 YEARS OF EXPERIENCE IN PRODUCT ANALYSIS KEY METRICS CUSTOMER BEHAVIORDATA USING KNOWLEDGE OF SQL PYTHON AND STATISTICSltbrgtltbrgtALTERNATE REQUIREMENTS BACHELORS DEGREE IN STATISTICS BIOSTATISTICS COMPUTER SCIENCE MATHEMATICS OR A CLOSELY RELATED ANALYTICAL FIELD OF STUDY PLUS FIVE 5 YEARS OF EXPERIENCE IN PRODUCT ANALYSIS KEY METRICS CUSTOMER BEHAVIORDATA USING KNOWLEDGE OF SQL PYTHON AND STATISTICSltbrgtltbrgtSPECIAL REQUIREMENTS MUST PASS TECHNICAL INTERVIEWltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtMore About Our BenefitsltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtWhether you work in an office or a distributed team Atlassian is highly collaborative and yes fun To support you at work and play we offer some fantastic perks ample time off to relax and recharge flexible working options five paid volunteer days a year for your favourite cause an annual allowance to support your learning ampamp growth unique ShipIt days a company paid trip after five years and lots moreltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtMore About AtlassianltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtCreating software that empowers everyone from small startups to the whos who of tech is why were here We build tools like Jira Confluence Bitbucket and Trello to help teams across the world become more nimble creative and alignedcollaboration is the heart of every product we dream of at Atlassian From Amsterdam and Austin to Sydney and San Francisco were looking for people who want to write the future and who believe that we can accomplish so much more together than apart At Atlassian were committed to an environment where everyone has the autonomy and freedom to thrive as well as the support of likeminded colleagues who are motivated by a common goal to Unleash the potential of every team ltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtAdditional InformationltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtWe believe that the unique contributions of all Atlassians is the driver of our success To make sure that our products and culture continue to incorporate everyones perspectives and experience we never discriminate on the basis of race religion national origin gender identity or expression sexual orientation age or marital veteran or disability statusltbrgtltbrgtAll your information will be kept confidential according to EEO guidelinesltbrgtltbrgtIf your experience looks a little different from what weve identified and you think you can rock the role wed love to learn more about youltbrgtltbrgtLearn more about Atlassians culture interviewing flow and hiring process by checking out our Candidate Resource Hub
